title: Watch: Hairstylist Chops Off 12 Inches Of Woman's Hair On Makeover Show, She Faints!
text:
Stress can lead to hair loss which in turn can lead to stress which in turn… you get the drift. Losing a lot of hair can be traumatising, even when it is done on purpose. Most of us have had that phase where we chop off our locks to mark the rebel in us.

Sometimes, we end up losing a lot of hair because the professional at the salon sucks at their job.

İlayda from Turkey loved her hair a lot. How do we know? You’ll find out. She agreed to appear on national television and undergo an on-screen makeover. In the video that is going viral, we see Stylist Bilal Agin chop off a major chuck of Illayda’s hair in one go, apparently without even taking her consent.





Bilal, without any hesitation, reportedly cut through 12-inches of İlayda’s silky smooth hair and she was visibly traumatized.

Devastated by the sudden loss of the hair, which probably took over an year to grow, Illayda burst into angry tears and prepared to walk off of the set. However, such was the extent of her trauma, that she did not even make her way out completely and fainted.

Well, while we agree that if the hair stylist didn’t consult her before chopping off such a big chunk of her hair, he is wrong, one also wonders, what was she expecting a makeover to be like?
